meanings.sent1: The rugulose surface of the leaf felt rough to the touch.
meanings.sent2: Her rugulose skin showed the signs of aging gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The rugulose pattern on the wallpaper made the room look more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The old map was so rugulose, it seemed to hold the secrets of ancient lands.
meanings.sent5: The rugulose texture of the fabric reminded her of crumpled paper.

meanings.definition: Covered in small wrinkles or ridges
meanings.sent1: The rugulose bark of the tree provided a good grip for climbing.
meanings.sent2: The rugulose shell of the turtle helped it blend into its environment.
meanings.sent3: The rugulose appearance of the cake frosting made it look like a miniature mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The rugulose path through the forest felt like a journey through time.
meanings.sent5: The rugulose texture of the rock made it slippery to walk on.

meanings.definition: Marked with fine wrinkles or ridges
meanings.sent1: The rugulose pattern on the vase added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: His rugulose handwriting was difficult to read.
meanings.sent3: The rugulose design on the phone case made it stand out from the rest.
meanings.sent4: The rugulose edges of the puzzle pieces made them fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The rugulose texture of the painting gave it a unique depth.
